summary: Website project about a place named Eden that brings peace to the whole earth.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Serene Eden valley landscape with soft light, gentle river, distant mountains, calm atmosphere (eden-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Minimal circular Eden emblem with a simple leaf/dove motif, flat style (eden-mark.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive single-page website for a place named “Eden” that communicates the idea that Eden brings peace to the whole earth, with clear sections and polished English copy.

Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a peaceful Eden concept (color palette, typography, spacing, and component styling) and use it consistently across the site (avoid default/plain styling).
Add a “Messages of Peace” guestbook section that lets visitors submit a short message (name optional) and view the latest messages.
Add the required generated images as static assets and use them in the UI (hero background/illustration and a simple Eden mark).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website about a place named Eden that brings peace to the whole earth.
Implement a Motoko backend API for the guestbook with methods to add an entry and list entries, including timestamps.
